snippet: Police raids interrupted a plot against fans gathering in Brussels to watch a telecast of a match between the Belgian national team and Ireland, officials said.
abstract: Belgian government officials say police raids conducted across country helped foil terrorist plot to attack people in Brussels watching televised soccer match between Belgian and Irish national teams; 40 people are brought in for questioning and 3 are charged.
lead_paragraph: Police raids interrupted a plot against fans gathering in Brussels to watch a telecast of a match between the Belgian national team and Ireland, officials said.

headline.main: Belgium Says It Prevented a Terror Attack on Soccer Fans
headline.print_headline: Belgium Says It Blocked Attack on Soccer Viewers
